org.pdfclown.bytes
Class Buffer

java.lang.Object
  org.pdfclown.bytes.Buffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, IBuffer, IInputStream, IOutputStream, IStream, IDataWrapper
public final class Buffer
extends Object
implements IBuffer

Byte buffer.

Version:
0.1.2, 01/29/12
